reviews.review: Really enjoyable game to just mess around in, or to take super seriously and climb the ranks. Just would recommend playing both survivor and killer. If you play with some friends it makes it so much more entertaining.

I played when it came out in 2016 and it was awesome.  Then things got bad so I quit playing for 2 years.  I started back in August 2019.  The game is as balanced as it has ever been.  I play both survivor and killer and love the grind.  Definitely recommend.  Just remember, it's very rough in the beginning.  It either takes 100+ hours of game play or a lot of Youtube learning videos to get good.

Game simplesmente incrível e nele contido uma experiência indescritível e assustadora, os mapas trazem dificuldades para o assassino e para os sobreviventes, como por exemplo, as janelas, que beneficiam os sobreviventes com uma jogabilidade fluída na escapatória, com perks e características que podem mudar sua gameplay de forma à decidir se vais ganhar ou perder, com os assassinos a mesma coisa, tem vários personagens diferentes para diversas forma de atordoar o sobrevivente, perks não mudam tanto a jogabilidade dos assassinos mas o que muda neles são sua habilidades, como por exemplo, a caçadora, que usa uma machadinha para lança-la aos sobreviventes e os derrubam na hora. Gráficos medianos, são bons mas podem melhorar, animações perfeitas e fluídas que fazem a jogabilidade parecer melhor do que ela já era. Músicas realmente assustadoras e tensas, quando está perseguido te dá um cagaço num nível que faz você imersar na hora de fugir e poder sobreviver para fugir no final. Jogo incrível e muito viciante.

Игра явно не стоит своей полной стоймости, лучше добавьте продукт в свой список желаемого и дождитесь скидки, а разницу потратьте на донат (в игре он многое решает) и того, вы получите больше профита за те же деньги. При таком расходе, вы получите ГАРАЗДО больше удовольствия от игры. Что насчёт геймплея, так он не надоест, так как разные убийцы, разные скилы, разные тактики, вы точно не заскучаете, я вам обещаю :D

Dead by Daylight is a fun game but it has so many problems.  The inbalance is off the charts.  Perks, (survivor and killer buffs) levels, (very good for survivor or overpowered for killer) skill-gap, (game's rank system does nothing, majority of players are experts) and many other things make this game very painful to play for a new player.  Even though I am somewhat good at DBD, I don't like this game because of the lazy, slack developers.  They are similar to EA, bombarding their game with 5$ DLCs every few months.  Without DLC content, the game doesn't have a whole lot to offer, as many survivors, killers, and perks are all locked behind paywalls.  As you most likely have heard countless times, this game is FULL of bugs and glitches.  BHVR is extremely slow at patching game issues, because they care more about profit than their own game.

Conclusion: game's developers are roasting pieces of garbage, game's full of inbalance for new and experienced players alike, and finally... 5$ DLC abundance taking fire over bug patches.  I do not recommend this game, also BHVR is one of the worst developers ever.  Don't put you're trust in them at all.

Dead by Daylight is a game every one should at least try. Steam has an amazing refund system so there is no reason not to try the game. I have never really enjoyed survival horror games. I did not like Friday the 13th but I really love this game. Its extremely fun with friends and recommend this game to anyone.

If you want to play with me feel free to hit me up. Anyways my main survivor now is David aka david king. I like playing him because of his perk called dead hard. Anyways perks are addons that you can add to a survivor to boost their skill and power within the trials. Every game is called a trial and a trial consists of 4 survivors and 1 killer. It's like your normal slasher game but not every game is the same. You can choose between many killers and many survivors. Many of these survivors have personalized perks which allow them to play differently from other people. My first main was meg thomas, and I picked her because she has the perk sprint burst, but sprint burst got nerfed so now I chose david king's dead hard. Dead hard is a perk that allows you to not take damage while you are injured. If you press the button on your keyboard labed E, then dead hard will activate. After 3 seconds and a little speed boost, dead hard causes exaustion. Exaustion is a debuff that stops you from using exausion perks like sprint burst and dead hard. Exaustion usually stays for about a minute, and will not go down if you are running. Anyways, running will leave scratch marks for the killer to find, and if you dont cover up your tracks the killer will find you. Anyways thats my explanation of dead by daylight or otherwize known as dbd. Thank you for reading my comment.

Very fun game to play either alone or with friends. It can be a bit overwhelming for starters as there is a huge learning curve and grind in order to stand a chance against skilled players, but when you get there and you actually understand how to play the game, it becomes really addictive and fun!

The devs are constantly adding content to the game and improving it in many ways, so I definitively recommend this game as a good experience overall.

I would just like to say before I put my review up for this, the game itself in terms of the concept, the gameplay at face value and time you can spend on it is great, always a thrilling experience and the constantly increasing roster for variety is nice. However...

List of things that suck:

* The Devs
* The Servers
* The Community
* High Ranks
* Matchmaking
* Teammates
* Overpowered items that are quote unquote "rare"
* Killer has too much power to be an asshole to 1 survivor at the cost of winning the match
* Developers think that toxic behaviour for no reason is a "legitimate strategy"
* Lag benefits killers greatly over the survivors which is bullshit
* If the killer ragequits, you get pretty much fuck all as a survivor
* If a survivor rage quits, well, killer gets points, other survivors NOW get some points but that was only as of yesterday but survivors get no compensation for a dc
* Punishment for playing like an asshole is non existent

The game has great potential and is fun if youre playing with friends and can be fun if youre lucky enough to have no assholes in your lobby, but its a rarity these days, theres always something to ruin your match 99% of the time. Devs need to pull their thumbs out of their asses and stop sucking the dicks of killers and start nerfing broken shit and punishing toxic behaviour properly before this game will start to really do its best

As for the game ignoring all these factors and in simplest terms, either you kill and they survive, or you survive and they kill. You and your "big brain" team mates have to power 5 generators and get the fuck out, killer has to slam each of you on a hook and try and sacrifice you. If you get found its your job to stay up as long as possible while using the least amount of resources as possible on the map in order to stall for enough time so that as many of you as possible can escape. If possible you should try and evade the killer, but good killers rarely lose survivors and will rather just give up the chase if they feel that it will take too long to down you and it would be more efficient to focus on generator patrol at that time.

Be smart, don't be a dick, and don't be toxic for no reason.

Unless theyre a Nea, if you see a Nea as a killer feel free to be a dick :P

I really like this game, it is fun to play with friends and mostly fun to play by yourself. The comment complaint I have is that the devs keep funding new skins, but never fund new game modes like unranked(which would seem very easy.), or maybe 2v8 gamemode( which i would assume be more difficult.)

Edit 1: currently the game has terrible matchmaking. The que times are very long. The matches are rarely even in ranks. When the devs do something to punish toxic players and fix the matchmatching i will change the review.

Dear Devs, I have the greatest idea ever! The survivors seem to be awefully overpowered, so why not take away:
- all windows
- all perks
- all pallets
- the hatch
- all items
And additonally make the hitboxes (even) bigger, like whole-map-wise, the killers faster (500% should be enough), the arms of the killers longer (or their weapons) and start endgame right at the beginning of the match, so those pesky little snot-survivors get 1 generator done at most, before they all are rightfully sacrificed.
Isn't that the best idea in the world? The killers will be sooo happy and will want to play the game like aaaaalll the time! :-D

Seriously, I understand endgame and some necessary changes, the game was very unfairly imbalanced before. But now the hitboxes are so big, that a hatchet literally can fly 2 meters to your side and will still hit you. I was on a hook when I saw the insane range on my would-be saviour - that can't be right! That should NOT have downed her.
When a survivor vaults a window, and the jump-sequence is already over and the survivor is already running again - the killer can still struck the fleeing survivor down. Through that window. Are you serious with this? This change is fairly new, and of course I don't mean unsafe jumps, where the jumping-sequence is still ongoing. But "safe" jumps, that worked before, are now pointless, because you're going to get hit - whether you're still standing by that window, or are already running away.

I'm pissy right know so this probably sounds like the mewling of a raging crybaby. But seriously, I enjoy the game - I do! But not when you cripple the survivor-play so strongly... The only chance of surviving any match right now is with a swf-team or a VERY good and helpful team of strangers. I can't imagine that the killer will like playing against swf-teams over and over and over... This game is attractive right now for new killers (assuming they are not matched with 4 P3-Level-7 survivors) - but against other new players who want to try the game? Pscht. Piece of cake... This discourages players. Is that really what you want?

Anyway, this rant will not change anything anyway... It's probably for the best to pause the game for some time. Have a great one, dear devs.
jogo muito bom
